pageProduct.name: Swisse Skincare Sweet Almond Gentle Cream Cleanser 125ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

WITH RICE BRAN WATER& POMEGRANATE EXTRACT

SWISSE SWEET ALMOND GENTLE CREAMCLEANSER gently yet effectively cleanses the skin,removing impurities while leaving the skin feeling softand balanced. Enriched with Sweet Almond Oil to nourishthe skin, Witch Hazel Water to soothe the skin and Rice Bran Water to improve skin hydration.

Suitable For: Normal or dry skin types

Size: 125mL

Warnings

Test prior to use. In the unlikely event of a negative reaction, consult your medical practitioner.

Ingredients

Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Water
Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil
Cetearyl Alcohol
Glyceryl Stearate SE
Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Flower Water
Glycerin (Plant Derived)
Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate
Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter
Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Fruit Extract
Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Seed Extract
Hyssopus Officinalis (Hessop) Leaf Oil
Commiphora Myrrha (Myrrh) Oil
Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil
Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil
Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil
Fusanus Spicatus Wood (Sandalwood) Oil
Vanilla Planifolia Fruit Extract
Citrus Medica Limonum (Lemon) Peel Oil
Cedrus Atlantica (Cedarwood) Bark Oil
Xanthan Gum
Dehydroacetic Acid
Benzyl Alcohol
Citric Acid

Directions

Blend a small amount between palms andmassage into wet skin in a circular motion. Rinse with warm water. Use twice daily, in the morning and evening.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 28°C.
